```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
nrow(campatt1)
nrow(dhist1)
mean(dhist1$amount)
median(dhist1$amount)
mean(as.integer(dhist1$is_anonymous))#hm why no work? 
mean(campatt1$nonprofit)
mean(na.omit(dhist1$isfemale))
```

```{r}
anonhist1 <- dhist1 %>% filter(is_anonymous == 1)
mean(anonhist1$amount)
median(anonhist1$amount)
```


```{r}
campatt1 <- na.omit(campatt1) %>% mutate(endprog = (amtraised/goalamt)*100)
```

```{r}
ggplot(campatt1, aes(x = endprog)) + geom_histogram(aes(y=..density..), colour="black", fill="white") +
 geom_density(alpha=.2, fill="#FF6666") + xlim(0,150) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(dhist1, aes(x = amount)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5) + xlim(0,150) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(dhist1, aes(x = amount, color = gender))  +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, fill= "white", alpha=0.5, position="identity") + xlim(0,150) 
```
